Summary: Light traveling in the night sky before disappearing
divs: Sighting DetailsWas watching the night sky while smoking a cigarette, I live in the flight path of the Charlotte douglas intl airport, and watched a plane ascent and above the plane was a small light, traveling in an eastern path before disappearing near the constellation of the Northern Crown, the light was way above the aircraft.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gastonia
There were no other sightings in Gastonia on or around May 19th 2012
